Title: The Apology
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Alex Kavallierou, Sara Lohman, David Budin (executive story editor), Brendan McCarthy (executive story editor)
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Jacob shares something with Frankie that upsets her. Everyone rallies around Robert when his mother dies. Mallory confides in Brianna.
